casebody.data:
Lita Wickser TOLAND
v.
John Gerard TOLAND Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 9, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn.App. 800, 182 A.3d 651 (2018), is denied.

McDONALD, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
